name: Adhesive Future Available Stock.
description: This measure represents the available stock from the previous day and subtracting the quantity required for the current day.
expression: VAR PrevDayCummReqQty = CummQtyReq - [Planning Schedule Adhesive Needed Quantity]
IF(  MAX( Calendar[Date] ) = MinSelectedDate , [Unrestricted Stock Quantity], [Unrestricted Stock Quantity] - PrevDayCummReqQty )
